author: tom
msg: Rackspace driver not so evil!
I noticed the Rackspace driver was doing some silliness regarding the
need for two hosts (one for auth, one for management) so I went ahead
and re-implemented the functionality as a property and fixed some bugs too.

author: tom
msg: Connection base classes had bad interface declarations.
IConnectionKey claimed to implement IConnectionUserAndKey, which is
certainly not the case. IConnectionUserAndKey didn't implement or
provide anything, the latter not being an issue because at least the
improper implements() on IConnectionKey was inherited.

author: tom
msg: Slicehost driver won't append default header [URGENT]
SlicehostConnection was overriding a non-existent method,
`default_headers` which will cause live requests to not include the
proper auth header.

author: polvi
msg: remove to_nodes/to_images/to_sizes from the NodeDriver interface

author: tom
msg: Added **kwargs to create_node.
This allows providers to offer special arguments to create_node (such as
`datacenter`) which will be used when creating the node. Docstrings must
document available keyword arguments. As INode does not specify other
attributes may not exist, these may be parsed and added to Node
instances as necessary.
